description: This file defines utility functions for making HTTP requests to a backend API, including methods for GET, POST, PUT, and DELETE. It manages an authorization token, constructs request URLs with query parameters, and handles responses and errors, serving as an API client module.

methods.name: function setToken(token: string | null) { setToken
methods.description: Sets the authorization token used in subsequent API requests.

methods.name: async function http<T = unknown>( http
methods.description: Performs an HTTP request with given method, URL, data, and query params, handling JSON response and errors.

methods.name: function get<T = unknown>(url: string, params?: Record<string, string|number|boolean|undefined>)/ get
methods.description: Performs a GET request to the specified URL with optional query parameters.

methods.name: function post<T = unknown>(url: string, data?: Record<string, unknown>) { post
methods.description: Performs a POST request to the specified URL with optional data payload.

methods.name: function put<T = unknown>(url: string, data?: Record<string, unknown>) { put
methods.description: Performs a PUT request to the specified URL with optional data payload.

methods.name: function del<T = unknown>(url: string) { del
methods.description: Performs a DELETE request to the specified URL.

ctags.name: BASE_URL
ctags.pattern: /^const BASE_URL = 'http:\/\/localhost:3001' \/\/ should be from env in prod$/

ctags.name: get
ctags.pattern: /^function get<T = unknown>(url: string, params?: Record<string, string|number|boolean|undefined>)/

ctags.name: post
ctags.pattern: /^function post<T = unknown>(url: string, data?: Record<string, unknown>) {$/

ctags.name: put
ctags.pattern: /^function put<T = unknown>(url: string, data?: Record<string, unknown>) {$/
